about_the_game:
“Treasure Hunting Club” is a first-person multiplayer online party game that combines elements of hide-and-seek and survival. You need to complete objectives while ensuring your survival, and crafting tools will increase your efficiency.

Join your friends on this island for a game of hide and seek!

Players are divided into two teams: Hunters and Hiders. The goal of the Hunters is to capture the Hiders, while the Hiders need to disguise themselves and avoid being captured. If the Hiders are not caught by the end of the countdown, they win the game.

As a Hider, you need to maintain your survival while avoiding the Hunters. To survive, you will need to chop trees, mine for materials to craft tools, and hunt for food. Be cautious, as the Hunters might be nearby.

As a Hunter, you need to collect materials to craft capture tools and weapons. Please note that as time progresses, the Hiders will also craft weapons to fight back. Capture all the Hiders within the time limit to win.

Character Settings

Hunter: Responsible for capturing Hiders, possesses strong tracking abilities and weapons.

Hider: Needs to collect ritual materials in the map while avoiding the Hunter’s pursuit, has the ability to disguise.

Resource Collection and Crafting

Material Collection: Players can collect materials such as wood, stone, and metal in the map.

Tool Crafting: Use the collected materials to create props and weapons to help achieve respective goals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
